instances.os: The OS of the VM to be deployed.
instances.user: The user you wish to SSH into the VM using
instances.vm_name: The URN of the image to be deployed. Can also just be a general term such as 'Debian'. Refer to the Azure CLI docs for more info.
instances.vm_size: The Size of the VM (recommend minimum 'Standard_B1s') - see Azure CLI docs for valid values.
instances.storage: Whether additional storage should be added -  yes/no
instances.storage_size: The size of the additional storage, in GB. Required ONLY if 'storage' is set to 'yes'.

containers.image: the name of the image. Can contain tags. Example: cis4010:gcc
containers.registry: The registry it can be found in.
containers.background: Whether it should be run in the background - yes/no
